column1: Kata Robata////If you are looking for traditional Japanese food
column2: this place has it all! The atmosphere can get quite noisy to the point where you have to pretty much yell at company to carry on a convo
column3: but the food was Good! We did sit towards the back in the corner which made handling the noise a little better. We like sushi a lot
column4: not a lot of sushi options but nonetheless still amazing. Parking is kinda hard to find if the shopping center the restaurant sits in is packed. They have valet
column5: but few spots available. We noticed a lot of high-end
column6: expensive cars parked in valet and people walking into this restaurant.
